open_threads.notes: BA (distance/local college) continues intermittently; fees/attendance stress; admit cards kept carefully. On Jan 3 she pays the fee and submits/uploads the paperwork via Sharma Ji; acknowledgement printed (awaiting confirmation). On Jan 4 she tries checking status at Sharma Ji’s shop; the portal is slow on Sunday, so she prints an extra acknowledgement copy as backup; confirmation still pending. On Jan 5 she checks again and sees status: ‘Payment received. Application under review.’ She prints this status as proof; still awaiting final confirmation/next steps.

On Jan 5, noticing the F/J home-row bumps on Sharma Ji’s keyboard nudges Priya into asking how to learn typing. Sharma Ji offers to show her when the shop is empty; Priya plans short practice sessions (15 minutes, three days a week) as a step toward steadier work.
Income is uneven (tutoring/odd work). Wants more stability without leaving home abruptly.
Lucknow is close enough to matter; occasional trips for forms/exams/hospitals/errands.
Low-simmer family/community expectations; keep subtle and non-melodramatic.
